Event.Message: CPU %3 exceeded its single DPC soft timeout of %5 clock ticks. A single DPC in module %7, with key %1, ran for %4 clock ticks on the thread with TID %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DpcRoutineKey" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ThreadID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:TID"/> <data name="CpuNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TickCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SoftTimeoutTicks" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ModuleNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ModuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ModuleNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: CPU %2 exceeded its cumulative DPC soft timeout of %4 clock ticks, by running at an IRQL greater than or equal to DISPATCH_LEVEL for %3 clock ticks on the thread with TID %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ThreadID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:TID"/> <data name="CpuNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CumulativeTickCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CumulativeSoftTimeoutTicks" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Thread %1 on CPU %2 exceeded the threshold of %4 ticks running at DISPATCH_LEVEL or higher, profiling started with sequence number %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ThreadID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:TID"/> <data name="CpuNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DpcSequenceNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ThresholdTicks" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Cumulative" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Message: Capture DPC sequence number %1 at tick %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DpcSequenceNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Tick" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
